attributes.action: Receive Congratulations for Ten Years in Office, and to stay another 10 Years in Office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All the very best Prime Minister, lets hope you can stay this Full term, go a Fourth Term and another 10 years in Office, lets hope the WMD will be found and the entire country finally say well done, we were wrong and you right. All the very best Sir.

rejection.details:
You are welcome to email your comments to the PM here
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page821.asp
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
